member.name: T:CustomControls.ExtendedPasswordBox
member.summary:
Represents a password box that can optionally display the password characters.
Implemented as user control with a and a for displayed characters.

remarks.para: Contrary to the .NET PasswordBox, the property for this control is bindable.
This control is typically used as follow:
. The property is bound to some checkbox, initially unchecked.
. If the client application does not care about security the property is bound to a string.

. If the client does care, the property is not bound and when the user clicks on some button or press Enter, the application reads the property. This property returns a password that is as secure as it can be.

member.name: P:CustomControls.ExtendedPasswordBox.Password
member.summary: Gets a secure or plain text password. Checks if the password has been displayed in plain text, if there was a binding on the Text property or if the client has initialized it, and returns a secure or plain text password accordingly.
member.returns:
An object with the following properties:
If the password has been displayed in plain text, if there was a binding on the Text property or if the client has initialized it, the returned object is a plain text password.
Otherwise, the returned object is a secure password.
